description: Liverpool news: Monday Night Club discuss title race
title: Liverpool news: Monday Night Club discuss title race
title_page: Liverpool news: Monday Night Club discuss title race - BBC Sport
maintext:
Former Premier League striker Chris Sutton told the Monday Night Club that the Premier League title is not Liverpool's to lose, saying that the Reds "will have a blip" at some stage.
The Athletic's Rory Smith agreed, suggesting they should be favourites but it is too early in the season to make that claim.
Sutton reflected on the Reds' form and 6-3 weekend win at Tottenham, stating: "Because of the nature and the strength of the Premier League, they will have a blip. What was remarkable about them on Sunday is they looked really refreshed and dynamic and powerful â€“ the scoreline flattered Tottenham in the end, it could've been double figures."
